### Project Overview
----------------------

Parks Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a bid for the construction of parking lots in the Cape Breton Highlands National Park.

### Tender Description
-----------------------

The project involves construction, renovation, and maintenance of parking lots to meet the needs of park visitors. The work includes excavation, grading, and surfacing of parking lots, as well as any necessary civil works. The scope of work may include general construction activities, as well as specialized services like paving and landscaping.

### Mandatory Instructions to Bidders
-----------------------------------------

*   Bids must be submitted via email to `soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca` or via fax to 855-983-1808.
*   Bids will be accepted as official only if they are received through these official channels.
*   Email attachments must be under 15 megabytes in size.

### Evaluation Criteria
-------------------------

The evaluation criteria include:

1.  Technical evaluation - assessing the bidder's capability, resources, and experience in delivering similar projects
2.  Financial evaluation - reviewing the bidder's pricing and payment terms
3.  Whole-of-life evaluation - assessing the bidder's overall value proposition

### Security Requirements
-------------------------

There are no specific security requirements associated with this tender.
